00033 const uint64_t Hypertable::END_OF_TIME = (uint64_t)-1;
00034 
00035 size_t TableIdentifier::encoded_length() {
00036   return 8 + Serialization::encoded_length_string(name);
00037 }
00038 
00039 void TableIdentifier::encode(uint8_t **buf_ptr) {
00040   Serialization::encode_string(buf_ptr, name);
00041   Serialization::encode_int(buf_ptr, id);
00042   Serialization::encode_int(buf_ptr, generation);
00043 }
00044 
00045 bool TableIdentifier::decode(uint8_t **buf_ptr, size_t *remainingPtr) {
00046   name = 0;
00047   id = generation = 0;
00048   if (!Serialization::decode_string(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &name))
00049     return false;
00050   if (!Serialization::decode_int(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &id))
00051     return false;
00052   if (!Serialization::decode_int(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &generation))
00053     return false;
00054   return true;
00055 }

00057 size_t RangeSpec::encoded_length() {
00058   return Serialization::encoded_length_string(start_row) + Serialization::encoded_length_string(end_row);
00059 }
00060 
00061 void RangeSpec::encode(uint8_t **buf_ptr) {
00062   Serialization::encode_string(buf_ptr, start_row);
00063   Serialization::encode_string(buf_ptr, end_row);
00064 }
00065 
00066 bool RangeSpec::decode(uint8_t **buf_ptr, size_t *remainingPtr) {
00067   start_row = end_row = 0;
00068   if (!Serialization::decode_string(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &start_row))
00069     return false;
00070   if (!Serialization::decode_string(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &end_row))
00071     return false;
00072   return true;
00073 }

00076 ScanSpec::ScanSpec() : row_limit(0), max_versions(0), start_row(0), start_row_inclusive(true), end_row(0), end_row_inclusive(true), interval(0, END_OF_TIME), return_deletes(false) {
00077   return;
00078 }
00079 
00080 size_t ScanSpec::encoded_length() {
00081   size_t len = 29;
00082   len += Serialization::encoded_length_string(start_row);
00083   len += Serialization::encoded_length_string(end_row);
00084   for (size_t i=0; i<columns.size(); i++)
00085     len += Serialization::encoded_length_string(columns[i]);
00086   return len;
00087 }
00088 
00089 void ScanSpec::encode(uint8_t **buf_ptr) {
00090   Serialization::encode_int(buf_ptr, row_limit);
00091   Serialization::encode_int(buf_ptr, max_versions);
00092   Serialization::encode_string(buf_ptr, start_row);
00093   *(*buf_ptr)++ = (uint8_t)start_row_inclusive;
00094   Serialization::encode_string(buf_ptr, end_row);
00095   *(*buf_ptr)++ = (uint8_t)end_row_inclusive;
00096   Serialization::encode_short(buf_ptr, (short)columns.size());
00097   for (size_t i=0; i<columns.size(); i++)
00098     Serialization::encode_string(buf_ptr, columns[i]);
00099   Serialization::encode_long(buf_ptr, interval.first);
00100   Serialization::encode_long(buf_ptr, interval.second);
00101   Serialization::encode_bool(buf_ptr, return_deletes);
00102 }
00103 
00104 bool ScanSpec::decode(uint8_t **buf_ptr, size_t *remainingPtr) {
00105   uint16_t columnCount;
00106   const char *column;
00107   uint8_t inclusiveByte;
00108 
00109   if (!Serialization::decode_int(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &row_limit))
00110     return false;
00111   if (!Serialization::decode_int(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &max_versions))
00112     return false;
00113   if (!Serialization::decode_string(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &start_row))
00114     return false;
00115   if (!Serialization::decode_byte(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &inclusiveByte))
00116     return false;
00117   start_row_inclusive = inclusiveByte ? true : false;
00118   if (!Serialization::decode_string(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &end_row))
00119     return false;
00120   if (!Serialization::decode_byte(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &inclusiveByte))
00121     return false;
00122   end_row_inclusive = inclusiveByte ? true : false;
00123   if (!Serialization::decode_short(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &columnCount))
00124     return false;
00125   for (short i=0; i<columnCount; i++) {
00126     if (!Serialization::decode_string(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &column))
00127       return false;
00128     columns.push_back(column);
00129   }
00130   if (!Serialization::decode_long(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &interval.first))
00131     return false;
00132   if (!Serialization::decode_long(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &interval.second))
00133     return false;
00134   if (!Serialization::decode_bool(buf_ptr, remainingPtr, &return_deletes))
00135     return false;
00136   
00137   return true;
00138 }

00141 std::ostream &Hypertable::operator<<(std::ostream &os, const TableIdentifier &table_identifier) {
00142   os << "Table Name = " << table_identifier.name << endl;
00143   os << "Table ID   = " << table_identifier.id << endl;
00144   os << "Generation = " << table_identifier.generation << endl;
00145   return os;
00146 }

00148 std::ostream &Hypertable::operator<<(std::ostream &os, const RangeSpec &range) {
00149   if (range.start_row == 0)
00150     os << "StartRow = [NULL]" << endl;
00151   else
00152     os << "StartRow = \"" << range.start_row << "\"" << endl;
00153   if (range.end_row == 0)
00154     os << "EndRow   = [NULL]" << endl;
00155   else
00156     os << "EndRow   = \"" << range.end_row << "\"" << endl;
00157   return os;
00158 }

00160 std::ostream &Hypertable::operator<<(std::ostream &os, const ScanSpec &scanSpec) {
00161   os << "RowLimit    = " << scanSpec.row_limit << endl;
00162   os << "MaxVersions = " << scanSpec.max_versions << endl;
00163   os << "Columns     = ";
00164   for (std::vector<const char *>::const_iterator iter = scanSpec.columns.begin(); iter != scanSpec.columns.end(); iter++)
00165     os << *iter << " ";
00166   os << endl;
00167   if (scanSpec.start_row)
00168     os << "StartRow  = " << scanSpec.start_row << endl;
00169   else
00170     os << "StartRow  = " << endl;
00171   os << "StartRowInclusive = " << scanSpec.start_row_inclusive << endl;
00172   if (scanSpec.end_row)
00173     os << "EndRow    = " << scanSpec.end_row << endl;
00174   else
00175     os << "EndRow    = " << endl;
00176   os << "EndRowInclusive = " << scanSpec.end_row_inclusive << endl;
00177   os << "MinTime     = " << scanSpec.interval.first << endl;
00178   os << "MaxTime     = " << scanSpec.interval.second << endl;
00179   return os;
00180 }
